nodes.text: The Phr'sha system was located in the Fei Hu sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. It was the origin point of the martial arts technique known as the Phr'shan maneuver.
The Phr'sha system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed it in grid square P-13.
